channel.title: Looking for a good sample edit app
channel.description: Hey everyone I am looking for an app that is good for sampling and further editing in order to import my sound in Auxy I would like to add some edited vocal line to my songs, prerecorded from YouTube videos and etc but I can’t find any suitable instruments for this purpose

item.title: Looking for a good sample edit app
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
For sure - also, Audiocopy by Retronym is another good choice if you need something free. I’ve had issues with it previously, and the dev of AudioShare is just fantastic so to me it’s worth throwing him a few bucks. But yeah - there’s options out there

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a good sample edit app

item.title: Looking for a good sample edit app
item.dc:creator: sbr
item.description:
iammane:

AudioShare

What I don’t like about GarageBand is its enormous file size, it’s too big for small feature I want to use
I’ll check out AudioShare, ty

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a good sample edit app

item.title: Looking for a good sample edit app
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’ll plus one GarageBand, if you need something more bare bones then I’d say AudioShare is a good choice too.
